entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections late this evening and overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
